content: प्रतिक्रिया {@--1@} Recompense, requital {@--2@} Retaliation, revenge, retribution. {@--3@} Counteracting, remedying, removal; अहेतुः पक्षपातो यस्तस्य नास्ति प्रतिक्रिया <ls>U. 5. 17</ls>; <ls>R. 15. 4.</ls> {@--4@} Opposition. {@--5@} Personal decoration, embellishment, dress. {@--6@} Protection. {@--7@} Help, succour. {@--8@} A fence.
